评论详情: Don't like the feel of the fabric. Cheap

Bought this as a gift and ended up using it as cleaning rags. If you hold it up to the light, you can see right through. They feel awful and look horrible. Do not waste your money. Don't be deceived by the price.. you WILL get what you pay for.. tissue paper clothes. Gross.

So it’s a cute shirt, but it is not a true bowling shirt. The fabric is not quite what you would expect from a bowling shirt, but that’s not the shirts fault. I let my husband do the Christmas shopping this year. I would not have purchased this shirt, my son did ask for a bowling shirt. It does run true to size. The colors are very nice. It’s super lightweight, but the quality is terrible.

评论概述: Cheap fabric, like lining fabric, shiny
评论详情: The colors and pattern are ok but fabric and stitching subpar. Runs Small
Overall, I like the shirt. Fits great and can be washed and ironed easily.
Decent enough for the price. I bought it because the image shows a bright (think company christmas party) red, and it's closer to brick red, almost burgundy.
only reason for 4 star not 5 is that it runs a little big! the material is comfortable and durable but it does wrinkle very easily.

评论概述: cheap quality shirt that hangs well!
评论详情: For a cheap shirt, this one actually fits well. It's loose in the stomach area but not so loose that it looks sloppy. The colors are nice. The style feels like it's from the 70s. If you can catch it on sale then it almost becomes a must-buy! The vintage look is making its way back!
I have several styles of this shirt from this brand and they are all great.

I like the bowling shirt that has different shades of white-brown in the center. It fits comfortably, not too tight or too loose. The polyester material isn't bad or rough, but it does not feel like it's worth $20.

These shirts run large. I am usually between an XL and an XXL, but I needed just a Large in this shirt. We bought a bunch of these to match at a family event, and all sizes ran large. Other than that, it's a good cheap shirt.
Bought for my son, and he likes it. Fits as expected.
Light. Soft. Fits to size.

I love the shirts, they fit well and hang well.  The only complaint i have is that there are two different styles of collar and I bought some of each not realizing it.  I do not like the camp collar as well.  That is my fault though because I didn't look carefully enough at what I was ordering.  I bought 5 of them and plan to buy several more soon.  One of the shirts had a flaw and it was replaced quickly.
This was a gift. My son liked it. Will go with lots of things.
This adds a nice touch of color to any muted outfit. It's nice and breathable too and doesn't run too big or too small.
Good looking shirt. Runs a tad small. Size up.
Really nice shirts. Run a little big compared to a regular shirt, though, so order accordingly
It's nice and comfortable
Nice fit good quality.

评论概述: Runs 1 size larger than what you order
评论详情: It is an ok shirt for the price, it  just runs a size too big.

This shirt is true to size and looks great. It’s comfortable and silky. It does not shrink in the dryer and doesn’t need to be ironed either. The colors and style are classic. The quality is perfect. I highly recommend this shirt for any formal outing.

I was so disappointed. I have looked at these Hardaddy camp shirts for a long, long time. The styles are great, but oh my, the fabric. This is the most indescribably terrible fabric feel I have ever experienced. A shirt made from a plastic grocery bag would feel better. Whatever this fabric is . . . I would recommend staying away from open flames and hot surfaces. I can only imagine what they would do to this material.  As much as I like the designs of Hardaddy shirts, I could never wear this fabric. I would definitely not recommend and I will definitely not order again.
its light weight and it’s perfect on the size
Love this product and this vendor. Item arrived on time, fits great, nice quality.  Will definitely shop this vendor again
Love it with jeans.

评论概述: Very Comfortable and true to size
评论详情: This shirt is very comfortable and is true to size. Due to its lightweight material, it keeps you cool on hot days.  The fit is nice and the material is rayon-like, thus requiring little ironing.  The shirt reminds me of the one worn on the TV Show Two and a Half Men.  The colors look exactly like the picture.
Like it so much I ordered another one in brown

评论概述: Fits well even on a heavier body.
评论详情: I love the color and style, very retro and looks great on me; I wear a 2X.  You need some kind of undershirt, because the material is very thin and can ride up if you have broad shoulders.  I just wear a tucked-in tank-top under it and it looks great, and gives me the option to unbutton the shirt if it's especially hot or I need some more flexibility.  Needs a little bit of care when drying, or it can hold wrinkles, but you should expect that of a shirt like this.

I know that I'm a little late on this fashion trend, but I don't care. The shirt is lightweight and very breathable. The style is classic bowling shirt and reminds me of the shirts Charlie would wear on the two and a half men TV show. I live in Florida, so this shirt is perfect for the heat as it is so lightweight and cooling!

This shirt has a nice silky feeling and hangs well. The stitching is well done as are the button holes. If the price were down around $15 as opposed to the current price of $22, this would be a five-star item as I have seen and gotten many other shirts of similar quality for that range. As it is, this is a solid four-star review.
Light weight and breathable, this shirt lets you channel Ricky Ricardo at the office on Friday or for dinner on the patio.
Good quality. Very comfortable. True to size. Great for dress up or down. Any occasion.
Great shirt. Breezy material. Fits true to size. Hubs is 6' and weighs about 240. XL fit him fine.

Nice shirt -- good casual vintage vibe. It fits a little larger than I would have liked. If you're in between two sizes, I'd suggest going with the smaller. I am in between L and XL shirts, ordered the XL, and wish I would have ordered the L (didn't mark down for it, just mentioning that in case it helps others).  It definitely requires ironing. As-shipped, it had very clear fold lines that didn't fall out after hanging. After washing and drying, and taking it out immediately while still a little damp and hanging it, it still ended up wrinkled and needed ironing to be wearable. Not the end of the world -- looks great once you iron it, but definitely increases the effort required to wear this shirt.  If you don't mind the ironing requirement, then this is a really good looking shirt and aa good value!

Here are my thoughts on the Hardaddy Men's Vintage Bowling short sleeved, button down, shirt.  I dig this style of shirt. It has that vintage or bowling shirt look to it. But it's dressy enough for business casual in most cases. Goes well with jeans too.  Plus it's not meant to be tucked in. Which suits my dad-bod needs just fine nowadays.  The shirt is silky smooth and soft. The wrinkles aren't too hard to get rid of like some shirts of this material. The lines are clean and even. The buttons are good, along with the sewing.  All in all, good shirt and a fair price to boot.

I'm a bigger guy- 6' and about 260lbs- the 2XL fit me perfectly. I lover this style of shirt and think it has a really great look. However I do wish the material was a little more breathable. Otherwise its a great shirt and I'm very happy with it. There was no weird or broken buttons or anything like that.

This shirt has to be ironed. It doesn't matter if you pull it from the dryer as soon as it stops, this shirt is wrinkled. It looks and feels nice, but I don't always have time to iron, so it is disappointing.

This shirt is exactly what you would expect. 100% synthetic and with a certain style. If you're going for this look and don't care if you bang it up while wearing it and won't wear again after a year of use. Then yeah, perfectly good shirt for that.

评论概述: A unique cross between bowling and Hawaiian shirts.
评论详情: The “Hardaddy Men’s Vintage Bowling Shirt Short Sleeve Button Down Hawaiian Summer Beach Casual Shirts” fit true to size. The material is thin and cool, which is just what I wanted for the coming Caribbean vacation. It is sewn well. The style is a unique cross between bowling and Hawaiian shirts.
The fabric however is not very breathable

评论概述: Comfortable, breathable, stylish shirt. Material a bit thin.
评论详情: I got this shirt to wear to work during the hot summer months. It is very nice and looks great at work. I get many compliments on the vintage look of the shirt. It is quite comfortable and breathable. The material is a bit on the thin side. If you are wearing it to work, you will probably want an undershirt with it.  The shirt run true to size. Overall, a nice stylish shirt that is sure to turn heads and garner compliments on its styling.

Fits very well and true to size (3XL). The material is soft but shows wrinkles very easily and seems like it will pill after wearing it for a while. Otherwise it is a great shirt and i've gotten many compliments on it!

This shirt is awesome! The colors are great, the fabric is a nice quality, well sewn together. However, sizing is a tad off. Ordered a 3X and it does fit, but it's not a true 3X - it seems to be a bit on the smaller side. Not small enough it won't be worn, but just be aware, it's cut a tad small. But overall, this shirt is wonderful and looks amazing.

评论概述: True to size and has a nice look!
评论详情: I never owned a bowling shirt - even when they were contemporary. But I wanted to look like Charlie Harper just to get a reaction. Plusses: I like the shirt, it looks good, yes the material is thin but not terrible, and it is true to size. cons: the sewing is a bit sketchy and very sloppy in places, especially at the button holes. this was enough to bring it to four for me.

I really like this retro shirt which I received in lake blue. I ordered that color because it wasn't as retro looking and, yup, it just looks nice. It's comfortable and the material is very lightweight. It wrinkles easily, however.
This is a very stylish shirt. I like the fabric it doesn't make me hot wearing it. It is sized like it should be.

The shirt is true to size, soft to touch, and a nice quality. I would suggest it, if you like this style of retro shirt. I do, so I like it, and would bet that if you like that style too, you would also like this shirt. It is soft, breathable, and a nice summer shirt.

评论概述: Nice breathable shirt but a little too thin
评论详情: This has a really interesting look to it. It’s sort of reminiscent of a traditional bowling shirt but also feels like it fits in with Central and South American fashion. It has a cool colour and looks classy without feeling too “buttoned up”. I can almost picture a row of gentlemen smoking cigars or munching on a Cubano, all of them with this on. I think the best way to describe it is to call it the quintessential summer vacation “fun dad” shirt.  The shirt has a nice feel too. It sort of has that nice slight scratchiness of linen. I’m not really a fan of polyester clothing but it is great to layer on top of a simple white tee.  The material is very breathable, maybe too breathable. It is quite thin and so I hope others go into this knowing that. I would be far too embarrassed to wear this on its own but it adds a nice layer without increasing the heat levels. This was the one factor that was a true miss.

Want to look like you stepped out of a 1970s bowling lane? This shirt will do the job. It is quite comfortable and looks good in person - basically, it looks like it does in the photo here. Fits correctly, too. Nice fabric, breezy so it won't get too hot. Could be a good dinner shirt at the beach.

评论概述: Hardaddy Men's Vintage Bowling Shirt – Comfortable and True to Size
评论详情: Imagine getting a shirt from Amazon that is actually true to size! Well, this is it. I am a solid XXL, and this fits great. It has a bit of an athletic fit in the arms, but there is plenty of room in the rest. Be aware that it is printed, not made from sewn panels, which might be a consideration depending on your preference.  I would have expected the buttons to be black to blend in, but the white buttons are not necessarily bad. The length is good for wearing untucked. Overall, it seems to be a nice everyday shirt. I would recommend it.

I acquired the "Lake Blue" colored shirt in a 3x. The fit is pretty good, and the look of the shirt is attractive. However, the blue color is a bit washed out. Looking at the options, some of the other colors are more vibrant and probably a better pick.  Though I like the look of the shirt, the material is rather thin. It's nice for breathability and coolness but it's thin enough to really need a t-shirt under it.

评论概述: Great vintage styling, looks like a 50s or early 60s bowling shirt.
评论详情: I ordered this Hardaddy Men's Vintage Bowling Shirt Short Sleeve Button Down Hawaiian Summer Beach Casual Shirt for my husband. He enjoys vintage styling, and liked the bowling shirt feel of this shirt.  This shirt is made of a manmade fabric, it is 95% polyester and 5% spandex. My husband said the fabric felt soft, kind of like rayon.  I ordered the shirt in a size M. My husband usually wears a size 44 jacket. The size chart for this shirt says a size M has a chest measurement of about 47”. The smallest size available was a M, so that’s what I ordered him.  The shirt actually fit him nicely. I expected it to be quite loose, but the shirt fit well.  My husband found the shirt lightweight and comfortable, he said the fabric was soft and felt cool for summer. His favorite color is green, so I ordered him the green shirt. The green is a saturated, middle green color. The front of the shirt has stripes in white and black, they show up well against the green.  There are six white buttons on the front of the shirt, there is also one breast pocket. My husband liked the bowling shirt style. He thought the shirt was very evocative of the late 1950s and early 1960s.  This looked nice with khakis, it also looked good with a pair of jeans.
I really like the styling of this shirt.  The material is soft, colors are bold, and the stitching is good.  I highly recommend.
Great quality, fit great!
I like the fit and look of this short, but the material is inexpensive and probably will wash out after a couple of seasons. OK fast fashion to refresh the wardrobe.
